In a land where no one fibs, fiction doesn't exist 
and movies consist of actors simply reading historical 
facts, unsuccessful screenwriter Mark (Ricky Gervais) 
gains fame and fortune -- and maybe the girl of his 
dreams (Jennifer Garner) -- by saying things that aren't 
true. Gervais and Matthew Robinson co-write and co-direct 
this mayhem-filled comedy that co-stars Rob Lowe. Look for 
cameos by Tina Fey, Jonah Hill and Philip Seymour Hoffman.

Starring: Ricky Gervais, Jennifer Garner

Director: Ricky Gervais
